Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: James_4_1979
Reviews.Content: hour boat ride venice airport freezing weather hotel extremely warm welcoming lovely cosy element reception introduced bruno desk true gentleman absolute delight talk privilege meet hotel carpets hear footsteps guests movements corridors wasnt major issue bathroom extremely clean maintained daily basis tastefully decorated venitian decor tea facilities breakfast consisted breads cold meats cheese cereals fruit hot cooked breakfast snacking local produce daily tours venice didnt issue hotel situated extremely close st marks square dont hear hustle bustle crowds outside bell ringing nearby basillica wonderfully unique touch visit venice definately consider hotel future holiday plans

Reviews.Title: “I can't believe the location for the price: GREAT!!”
Reviews.Author: Kym-Anh
Reviews.Content: ive venice numerous times location affordable price proximity st marks square outstanding vaporetto stop block bathroom super clean breakfast ample wont hungry breakfast believe dear gentleman night desks name bruno helpful born raised venice dinner recommendations previous trip venice restaurant recommended delicious bruno offer tell cant wrong hordes pricey tourist trap restaurants poor quality hard meal value bruno reservations 2 nights 2 restaurants neighborhood lives quieter touristy neither restaurant crowded excellentand inexpensive ill look notes restaurants waiting arrived offered exceptional service quality food wonderful prices beaten path restaurant own pastas homemade pasta menu changes daily id stay albergo firenze heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value for money, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sylvia M
Reviews.Content: returned staying hotel lovely staff excellent position breakfast definitely return stayed similar priced hotels rome florence luxury compared clean breakfast ideal stayed quad fine 3 teenage sons breakfast close easy thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “The best location in town???”
Reviews.Author: Ollyolly
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel firenze nights start december 2011 warm cosy clean importantly middle action san marco paces st marks square breakfast wasnt amazing thrown reasonable rate staff spoke excellent english thats probably pretty common venice fivestar hotel budget

Reviews.Title: “Charming Hotel in Venice”
Reviews.Author: Donna M
Reviews.Content: charming hotel heart venice san marcos venice soon learned centrally located hotel clean quiet managed continental breakfast cappuccino lovely rooftop terrace november little chilly sit outside price fair 180 euro 2 nights return venice definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely, top-quality, excellent value-for-money hotel in the perfect location.”
Reviews.Author: matthewradford
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel firenze 3 nights november 2011 70 euros night comfortable spacious bathroom heavenly breakfast excellent variety cereals croissants meats bread fruit etc importantly staff helpful polite friendly gladly recommend firenze hotel friends intend travelling venice

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Venice”
Reviews.Author: Rita K
Reviews.Content: truly enjoyed hotel easy train station means dont shlepping venice vaparettos lodging staff extremely helpful bent backwards stay nice clean pleasant lounge lovely dining huge nice breakfast definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “a neat little hotel close to 'everything.'”
Reviews.Author: NewYorkLady9
Reviews.Content: hotel firenze minutes walk water easy designer shops antiques restaurants hotels enter little courtyard close piazza san marco quiet special comfortable clean quietthe staff friendly helpful thoughtful breakfast served pleasant lovely little respite

Reviews.Title: “Not easy to find - but worth the effort!”
Reviews.Author: Kule Dude
Reviews.Content: arranged visit wifes birthday mid november weather cool dry sunshine booked hotel booking agency cheaper prices advertised hotels website reported travellers bathrooms clean fitted bathrooms managed fit wc bath bidet shower basin radio telephone space breakfast salad etc reception staff friendly helpful recommendations restaurants reading reviews restaurant chance found reviews trip advisor food atmosphere reasonable venice price location hotel ideal 80 yards piazza san marco vaporetto stage comment budget amount money venice holiday double shouldnt try cash machines half stay prices eating drinking prices clothes stop blood pressure rising recommend hotel venice wonderful city

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful roof terrace”
Reviews.Author: Martin_Gottschlich
Reviews.Content: spacious nice clean hotel perfectly located 3 min walk st marks wonderful roof terrace ideal breakfast nice weather breakfast carried breakfast roof terrace extra fee negative hotel mismanaged nights stay partner hotel nearby hotel casanova latter bad lower category hotel firenze rates charged

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel and in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Sangreer
Reviews.Content: due guests arriving upgraded balcony ive marked based ours pretty cosy quiet lovely roof terrace views city wheelchair mobility friendly lift goes 3 floor 4 floors heart san marco staff friendly tasty homemade cakes breakfast id stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: AJSF10
Reviews.Content: days break pleasantly surprised hotel location near san marco square review stated perfectly located near san marco boat stop particularly helpful top floor lovely balcony staff friendly helpful definitely recommend
